title: Dark and Dystopian Music Pack
description: A captivating world with a fusion of rock, orchestral, and electronic elements. These tracks are great for action games in a dystopian worlds, dark fantasy games, futuristic-themed games, etc…
longDescription:
Welcome to the Dark and Dystopian Music Pack by Carxofa Music. Immerse your players in a captivating world with a fusion of rock, orchestral, and electronic elements. Experience the richly layered instrumentation that evokes a sense of unease.


These tracks are great for action games in a dystopian worlds, dark fantasy games, futuristic-themed games, etc…


Here you can preview a sample of each track
technicalDetails:
The Dark and Dystopian Music Pack includes


  • 10 Original Tracks (WAV 44.1 kHz 16 bit, loop seamless)
  • 2 or 3 Alternative Mixes of each track with different instruments
  • 4-6 stems for each track with the instruments grouped by families (keys, guitars, etc...)
  • 5-20 tracks of each track with each instrument individually
  • A file with all the information of each track (BPM, key, duration, time signature, etc)


If you don't need all this files, you can find a LITE version just with the main files at an affordable price



Number of Audio Wavs: 257

Number of Audio Cues: 257

Sample rate / bit rate: WAV 44.1kHz 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 21:04 min (More than an hour with Alternative Mixes and Stems)

Supported Development Platforms: ALL

Documentation: https://www.carxofamusic.com/dark-and-dystopian-music-pack/


If you need more information please, contact with me
